definition: A gathering of relatives, typically held on a regular basis, where family members come together to spend time with one another, share stories, and strengthen familial bonds. It is often organized to celebrate special occasions or milestones within the family, and may involve activities, meals, and conversations centered around family history and traditions.

examples.german: Wir haben uns zum Familientreffen getroffen.
examples.english: We met for a family gathering.

examples.german: Das Familientreffen findet jedes Jahr statt.
examples.english: The family reunion takes place every year.

examples.german: Beim Familientreffen haben wir viel gelacht.
examples.english: We laughed a lot during the family gathering.
The family reunion was very nice.

examples.german: Beim Familientreffen haben wir alte Fotos angeschaut.
examples.english: During the family gathering, we looked at old photos.
